name: Project H.A.M.M.E.R.
storyline: The game would have been set in the future United States of America, during a robot invasion. M-09, a cyborg created by a government organization known as Project H.A.M.M.E.R., is tasked with saving the earth from the invading forces.
summary: A game that was originally announced at E3 '06 about a time when robots are taking over the U.S. The player was to take control of a character tasked with fighting them off. It has since been cancelled.
